Electronic Tools Wall, Structure

Return to project page

Design

The Electronic Tool Wall will be a French cleat shelf designed specifically for electronic projects.

It will :

  • Be roughly the same size as my screen : 80 x 34 cm (The design picture is wrong).
  • Be made of 5 horizontal cleats
  • Have 2 metal rectangle tubes to hold the horizontal cleats.
  • Hang on the wall with 2 screws, from the metal tubes.

The specificity of this project is that there will be all electrical power along the Structure. So there will be some grooves and hollows in the wood as it can be seen from the back view (here aside).

Each horizontal cleat will have 5 electrical plugs, thus 5 holes. This task does not handle with electrical stuff but it should prepare for it while does the wood work.

Additionally to the holes, there will be a groove all along the cleat to pass the cables.

Here you can see the cross section of one cleat the with its dimensions (left), and a cleat section with the hole and the groove.
